### 1. Oct. 20 (HWs 1-6)
### 2. Dec. 08 (HWs 7-12)

---
# Quizzes (15% of grade)

--
## `r fa('calendar-alt')` In class every other week-ish (7 total, drop lowest 2)

--
## `r fa('clock')` 5 minutes (3-5 questions)

--
## `r fa('tasks')` [Example quiz](https://p4aquizdemo.formr.org/)

--
> **Why quiz at all?** There's a phenomenon called the "retrieval effect" - basically, you have to _practice_ remembering things, otherwise your brain won't remember them (details in the book ["Make It Stick: The Science of Successful Learning"](https://www.hup.harvard.edu/catalog.php?isbn=9780674729018)).

---
# Exams (32% of grade)

--
## `r fa('calendar-alt')` Midterm (weeks 1 - 6) on Oct. 20

--
## `r fa('calendar-alt')` Final (weeks 1 - 13) on Dec. 15

---
## **Grading**: Standard

Course Component     | Weight | Notes
---------------------|--------|-----------------------------------
Homeworks            | 48%    | 12 x 4% each
Quizzes              | 15%    | 5  x 3% each
Midterm Exam         | 12%    |
Final Exam           | 20%    |
Participation        | 5%     |

---
## **Grading**: Alternative Minimum Grade (AMG)

- Students who struggle early on, but work hard to succeed in 2nd half.
- Highest possible grade is "C"

Course Component   | Weight
-------------------|----
Best 10 Homeworks  | 40%
Best 4 Quizzes     | 10%
Midterm Exam       | 10%
Final Exam         | 40%
